thread.section_title: CANDY CLUB Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CANDY CLUB | candyclub.com
thread.title: Bryn Mckibbin
thread.title_full: CANDY CLUB reviewed by Bryn Mckibbin

author: Bryn Mckibbin
title: Bryn Mckibbin
text:
I love the candy but the price is a little too much for me, I went to go cancel my subscription but the site told me nothing other than call them. I've tried calling them in their normal business hours and I only got a message that said they were out at a company event.... been getting that all day!
UPDATE!!!
Literally right after I posted my review I got a call from candy club and we fixed the issue he even offered to give me a 10% discount for next month!! Will definitely keep using them in the future
